items.name: PostgreSQL Backends connected (Total)
items.description:
Returns the total number of backend connections (including the check query itself).

Accepts the default connection parameters plus the following:
Database: count only the given database name or OID
User: count only the given user name or OID
Client: count only the given IP address or hostname
Waiting: true|false count only backends waiting on a lock

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Backends connections available
items.description:
Returns the total number of available backend connections remaining (excluding the check query itself).

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Backends connections used %
items.description:
Returns the total number of used backend connections as a ratio of the total available.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Buffers allocated/sec
items.description: Number of buffers allocated

items.name: PostgreSQL Buffers written directly by a backend/sec
items.description: Number of buffers written directly by a backend

items.name: PostgreSQL Backend fsync call executions/sec
items.description: Number of times a backend had to execute its own fsync call (normally the background writer handles those even when the backend does its own write)

items.name: PostgreSQL Buffers written during checkpoints/sec
items.description: Number of buffers written during checkpoints

items.name: PostgreSQL Buffers written by the background writer/sec
items.description: Number of buffers written by the background writer

items.name: PostgreSQL Checkpoints performed on request
items.description: Number of requested checkpoints that have been performed

items.name: PostgreSQL Checkpoints performed on schedule
items.description: Number of scheduled checkpoints that have been performed

items.name: PostgreSQL Average interval between checkpoints
items.description:
Returns the average interval in seconds between each checkpoint that has occurred since statistics were reset, or 0 if no checkpoints have occurred.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Checkpoint sync time
items.description: Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk, in milliseconds

items.name: PostgreSQL Checkpoint time
items.description:
Returns the percentage of time spent writing or syncing checkpoints since statistics were reset.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Checkpoint write time
items.description: Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk, in milliseconds

items.name: PostgreSQL Server responding
items.description:
Returns 1 on successful connection, otherwise 0.

Accepts only the default connection parameters.
NOTE: If you are using connection pooling, this parameter should bypass the connection pooler and connect directly to your PostgreSQL server. Create a second item key to check the availability of your connection pooler.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Database transaction ID age (oldest)
items.description:
Returns the age (as a transaction count) of the oldest Transaction ID for all readable databases.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Background writer stops
items.description: Number of times the background writer stopped a cleaning scan because it had written too many buffers

items.name: PostgreSQL Module version
items.description:
Returns the version string for the installed PostgreSQL agent module.

Does not accept any parameters.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Prepared transaction age
items.description:
Returns the age of the oldest transaction that is currently prepared for two phase commit.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Prepared transaction count
items.description:
Returns the number of transactions that are currently prepared for two phase commit.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Prepared transaction used %
items.description:
Returns the number of transactions that are currently prepared for two phase commit as a percentage of the maximum available prepared transactions.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Longest running query
items.description:
The duration in seconds of the longest running, currently active query for all databases.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Server start time
items.description:
Returns the UTC timestamp that the PostgreSQL server process started.

Accepts only the default connection parameters.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

items.name: PostgreSQL Background writer statistics last reset
items.description: Time at which the background writer statistics were last reset

items.name: PostgreSQL Server uptime
items.description:
Returns the number of seconds since the PostgreSQL server process started

Accepts only the default connection parameters.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

discovery_rules.name: Discover PostgreSQL Databases
discovery_rules.description: Discover all databases available for connection

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database disk block hits/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of times disk blocks were found already in the buffer cache, so that a read was not necessary (this only includes hits in the PostgreSQL buffer cache, not the operating system's file system cache)

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database disk blocks read/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of disk blocks read in this database

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database time spent reading data on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Time spent reading data file blocks by backends in this database, in seconds

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database time spent writing data on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Time spent writing data file blocks by backends in this database, in seconds

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database conflicts/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery in this database. (Conflicts occur only on standby servers; see pg_stat_database_conflicts for details.)

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database deadlocks/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of deadlocks detected in this database

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database backends connected on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of backends currently connected to this database. This is the only column in this view that returns a value reflecting current state; all other columns return the accumulated values since the last reset.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database statistics last reset on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Time at which these statistics were last reset

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database temp data write/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database temp files created/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of temporary files created by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created (e.g., sorting or hashing), and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database rows deleted/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows deleted by queries in this database

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database rows fetched by bitmap scans/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows fetched by queries in this database

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database rows inserted/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows inserted by queries in this database

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database rows returned by sequential scans/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows returned by queries in this database

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database rows updated/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows updated by queries in this database

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database transactions committed/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database transactions rolled back/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database transaction ID age on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description:
Returns the age (as a transaction count) of the current Transactions ID for this database.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database oldest prepared transaction on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description:
Returns the age of the oldest transaction that is currently prepared for two phase commit on this database.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database transactions prepared on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description:
Returns the number of transactions that are currently prepared for two phase commit on this database.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database longest running query on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description:
The duration in seconds of the longest running, currently active query for database {#DATABASE}.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database index scans/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of index scans initiated for all tables in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database live rows fetched by indexes/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of live rows fetched by index scans for all tables in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database estimated dead rows on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Estimated number of dead rows for all tables in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database estimated live rows on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Estimated number of live rows for all tables in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database estimated modified rows since analyze on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Estimated number of rows modified since tables were analyzed in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database rows deleted/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows deleted for all tables in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database rows hot updated on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows HOT updated (i.e., with no separate index update required) for all tables in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database rows inserted/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows inserted for all tables in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database rows updated/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows updated for all tables in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database estimated row count on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Estimated number of rows for all tables in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database sequential scans/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of sequential scans initiated on all tables in this database.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Database live rows fetched by scans/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of live rows fetched by sequential scans for all tables in this database.

discovery_rules.name: Discover PostgreSQL Indexes
discovery_rules.description: Discover all indexes available to the connected user

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Index buffer hits/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of buffer hits in this index

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Index blocks read/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of disk blocks read from this index

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Index scans/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of index scans initiated on this index

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Index fetched/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of live table rows fetched by simple index scans using this index

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Index entries returned/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of index entries returned by scans on this index

discovery_rules.name: Discover PostgreSQL Settings
discovery_rules.description:
Discovers all known configuration settings.

Accepts only the default connection parameters.

Requires libzbxpgsql v1.0.0 or above.

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Setting: {#SETTING}

discovery_rules.name: Discover PostgreSQL Tables
discovery_rules.description: Discovery PostgreSQL Tables available to the connected user

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table analyze count on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of times this table has been manually analyzed

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table autoanalyze count on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of times this table has been analyzed by the autovacuum daemon

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table autovacuum count on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of times this table has been vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table index scans/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of index scans initiated on this table

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table live rows fetched by indexes/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of live rows fetched by index scans

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table last analyze on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Last time at which this table was manually analyzed

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table last auto-analyze on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Last time at which this table was analyzed by the autovacuum daemon

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table last auto-vacuum on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Last time at which this table was vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table last manual vacuum on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Last time at which this table was manually vacuumed (not counting VACUUM FULL)

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table estimated dead rows on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Estimated number of dead rows

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table estimated live rows on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Estimated number of live rows

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table rows deleted/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows deleted

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table rows hot updated on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows HOT updated (i.e., with no separate index update required)

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table rows inserted/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows inserted

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table rows updated/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of rows updated

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table estimated row count on {#PATH}
PostgreSQL Table sequential scans/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of sequential scans initiated on this table

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table live rows fetched by scans/sec on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of live rows fetched by sequential scans

item_prototypes.name: PostgreSQL Table manual vacuum count on {#PATH}
item_prototypes.description: Number of times this table has been manually vacuumed (not counting VACUUM FULL)
